description: Application to replace extant full planning permission reference: P080514 (dated 14 April 2009) for the: Change of use of building from a bingo hall (Use Class D2) to place of religious worship (Use Class D1) with additional secondary D1 and D2 uses of the main auditorium as a cinema, theatre, live music, sports events, hospitality events, and educational, training and public lectures. Creation of three small screen cinemas at first and second floor level; operation of a refreshments bar and a coffee bar at ground floor level and a cafe / restaurant (Use Class A3) at first floor level; creation of youth / community facilities (Use Class D1) at third floor level; together with refurbishment of both interior and external elevations.
decision_conditions:
REASON: Harm to Vitaility and Vibrancy of the Town Centre

This proposal would result in the loss of a town centre use key to the sustained vitality and viability of Angel Town Centre and its status as a cultural destination, contrary to Islington Core Strategy (2011) policy CS5 and emerging: Islington Development Management Policies (Submission June 2012) Document policies DM21 and DM29 and Islington Site Allocation (Submission June 2012) document site AUS7.
